snippet: Unlike predecessors who traveled to the United States before rising to the papacy, Pope Francis has waited until age 78 to visit the country that thinks of itself as the center of everything.
abstract: Pope Francis, who has never visited United States, is set to visit America in September; those in close relationship with Francis remark that he has instead focused on poorer nations and his home of Latin America.
lead_paragraph: Unlike predecessors who traveled to the United States before rising to the papacy, Pope Francis has waited until age 78 to visit the country that thinks of itself as the center of everything.

headline.print_headline: Francis Is Coming to America After Avoiding It for 78 Years
headline.main: Pope Francis’ Visit to U.S. Is His First Ever, for Several Reasons
